lead_paragraph: An effort is underway to shed light on the career of Henry Grant Plumb, who taught at Cooper Union, painted village panoramas and sent charming illustrated letters.

headline.print_headline: An 1800s Painter Steps Out of the Shadows
headline.main: An 1800s Painter Steps Out of the Shadows

snippet: An effort is underway to shed light on the career of Henry Grant Plumb, who taught at Cooper Union, painted village panoramas and sent charming illustrated letters.
abstract: Eve M Kahn Antiques column; art consultant and curator Christine I Oaklander hopes to revive interest in painter Henry Grant Plumb with series of events and publications; World War I posters from collection of Col Edward H McCrahon will be auctioned by Guernsey’s auction house in New York.
